briefTitle: Role of the Immune Environment in Response to Therapy in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Role of the Immune Environment in Response to Therapy in Breast Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, ER Positive Breast Cancer, HER2-negative Breast Cancer, TNBC - Triple-Negative Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Collecting, processing and archiving breast cancer tumor tissues
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

Women 18 years of age or older with non-metastatic breast cancer undergoing surgical resection in the University of Pennsylvania Health System.

Exclusion criteria:

Males Children Pregnant individuals
